Name: The Comfort of Home
Description: Rakosan, who's been fully devoted to the reconstruction of Spacetrek Observatory, finds himself with a visitor today...
QuestDesc: Rakosan, who's been fully devoted to the reconstruction of Spacetrek Observatory, finds himself with a visitor today...

Dialogues.Speaker: Talkie
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}! {PlayerName}! A visitor at the Observatory!

Dialogues.Speaker: Talkie
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's Odette! It's Odette! She brought us snacks!

Dialogues.Speaker: Talkie
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Odette is Rakosan's wife! She brought us snacks!

Dialogues.Speaker: Talkie
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}! {PlayerName}! A visitor at the Observatory!

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 1
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now that the baseplates have been deployed, Rakosan can finally—

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 1
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This pizza… It tastes just like the ones we had back in Rinascita. Thank you for making it, dear.

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 2
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, it's the least I can do for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rakosan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This pizza… It tastes just like the ones we had back in Rinascita. Thank you for making it, dear.

Dialogues.Speaker: Odette
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, it's the least I can do for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You should have a proper celebration, Rakosan. It's also a way to honor the good wishes of the one who cares about you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rakosan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I know. But the only reason I can still celebrate my birthday… is because I survived. The others... those I worked with... were all lost in that Void Storm.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rakosan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I was lucky not to be in the Observatory that day. But Dhalifa… I can hardly bring myself to think about her condition.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rakosan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm sorry, Odette, but I can't celebrate my survival when others never had that chance. Let me just… finish the reconstruction first.

Dialogues.Speaker: Odette
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rakosan…

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 1
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Dhalifa's hungry! Dhalifa's hungry!

Dialogues.Speaker: Actor No. 2
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Shh—

Dialogues.Speaker: Talkie
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Dhalifa's hungry! Dhalifa's hungry!

Dialogues.Speaker: Dhalifa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Shh—

Options.PlotLineKey: Look what I brought you, Dhalifa!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The pizza is fragrant enough to bring something resembling a grin to Dhalifa's face.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dhalifa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Smells so good...

Dialogues.Speaker: Talkie
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "The warmth wraps the air in an irresistible aroma. Just the scent alone paints a picture of how it'll taste," says Dhalifa!

Dialogues.Speaker: Dhalifa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Crunchy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Talkie
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Crispy crust and gooey cheese meet each other in a small bite, bursting with flavor that dances across my tongue," says Dhalifa!

Dialogues.Speaker: Dhalifa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rich flavor.

Dialogues.Speaker: Talkie
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Then comes the gemberry sauce that blends with the sausage and cheese in a perfect, layered harmony. Every bite brings a new, lingering taste to savor," says Dhalifa!

Dialogues.Speaker: Dhalifa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Perfection.

Dialogues.Speaker: Talkie
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "A pizza baked by a classic clay oven… absolutely perfect. My final verdict? Another one, please," says Dhalifa!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wow... that was a real gourmet review right there.

Dialogues.Speaker: Talkie
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Dhalifa's hungry! Dhalifa's hungry!

Dialogues.Speaker: Dhalifa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Shh—

Options.PlotLineKey: Look what I brought you, Dhalifa!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The pizza is fragrant enough to bring something resembling a grin to Dhalifa's face.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dhalifa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The warmth wraps the air in an irresistible aroma. Just the scent alone paints a picture of how it'll taste.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dhalifa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Crispy crust and gooey cheese meet each other in a small bite, bursting with flavor that dances across my tongue.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dhalifa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then comes the gemberry sauce that blends with the sausage and cheese in a perfect, layered harmony. Every bite brings a new, lingering taste to savor.

Dialogues.Speaker: Dhalifa
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A pizza baked by a classic clay oven… absolutely perfect. My final verdict? Another one, please!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wow... that was a real gourmet review right there.

Dialogues.Speaker: Odette
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now that the baseplates have been deployed, Rakosan can finally—

Dialogues.Speaker: Odette
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, nice to meet you. You must be {PlayerName}. Rakosan had told me so much about your contributions to the reconstruction. I've always wanted to thank you in person.

Dialogues.Speaker: Odette
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I hope I'm not disturbing your work here, but today is Rakosan's birthday. I've made some dishes from our hometown and wanted to—

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As you two are talking, Rakosan hurries over.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rakosan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What are you doing here? We talked about this. No celebrations until after the project! I don't have time for this!

Dialogues.Speaker: Odette
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But I got all the ingredients from—

Dialogues.Speaker: Rakosan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I said no! My birthday... How could I celebrate anything now...

Options.PlotLineKey: Don't let Odette's kindness go to waste, Rakosan.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rakosan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I just—alright, fine. Let's do it then.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rakosan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I… well. Thank you, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Odette
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Look, I brought pizza—freshly baked in the clay oven. It's been ages since we last had a slice.

Options.PlotLineKey: Now that really brings back some good memories. Are you from Rinascita?

Dialogues.Speaker: Rakosan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We are, though we've been away for so long… so long that I can barely remember the taste of pizza anymore.

Dialogues.Speaker: Rakosan
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you, Odette. I'll take a slice, then. {PlayerName}, could you bring some to Dhalifa? She's never had pizza before.
